sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section
    :style="`background-image: url(${this.API_URL}/home_page/background/${this.backgroundImagePath});width:400px;height:400px;`"
  >
    <slot />
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import {getPicturesGroupByNames} from "../services/picture";

export default {
  name: "HomeLayout",
  data: () => ({
    backgroundImagePath: ""
  }),
  async created() {
    this.API_URL = process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL;
    await getPicturesGroupByNames("home", "background")
        .then(fileName => {
            this.backgroundImagePath = fileName;
          }
        )
  }
}
</script>
